verses.verse: <S%H4905>Maschil<s%> of <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H250>Ezrahite<s%>. I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of the <S%H2617>mercies<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: with my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will I make <S%H3045>known<s%> thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>. Maschil: or, A Psalm for Ethan the Ezrahite, to give instruction to all: Heb. to generation and generation
For I have <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2617>Mercy<s%> shall be built <S%H1129>up<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> shalt thou <S%H3559>establish<s%> in the very <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
I have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with my <S%H972>chosen<s%>, I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>,

Thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and build <S%H1129>up<s%> thy <S%H3678>throne<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H6382>wonders<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> also in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H6918>saints<s%>.

For who in the <S%H7834>heaven<s%> can be <S%H6186>compared<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? who among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H410>mighty<s%> can be <S%H1819>likened<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>?

<S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7227>greatly<s%> to be <S%H6206>feared<s%> in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of the <S%H6918>saints<s%>, and to be had in <S%H3372>reverence<s%> of all them that are <S%H5439>about<s%> him.
O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, who is a <S%H2626>strong<s%> <S%H3050>LORD<s%> like unto thee? or to thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> thee?
Thou <S%H4910>rulest<s%> the <S%H1348>raging<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: when the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof <S%H7721>arise<s%>, thou <S%H7623>stillest<s%> them.

Thou hast <S%H1792>broken<s%> <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> in <S%H1792>pieces<s%>, as one that is <S%H2491>slain<s%>; thou hast <S%H6340>scattered<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> with thy <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>. Rahab: or, Egypt thy: Heb. the arm of thy strength

The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are thine, the <S%H776>earth<s%> also is thine: as for the <S%H8398>world<s%> and the <S%H4393>fulness<s%> thereof, thou hast <S%H3245>founded<s%> them. the fulness: or, all it containeth
The <S%H6828>north<s%> and the <S%H3225>south<s%> thou hast <S%H1254>created<s%> them: <S%H8396>Tabor<s%> and <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> shall <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
Thou hast a <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>: <S%H5810>strong<s%> is thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H7311>high<s%> is thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>. a: Heb. an arm with might

<S%H6664>Justice<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> are the <S%H4349>habitation<s%> of thy <S%H3678>throne<s%>: <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> shall <S%H6923>go<s%> before thy <S%H6440>face<s%>. habitation: or, establishment

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3045>know<s%> the joyful <S%H8643>sound<s%>: they shall <S%H1980>walk<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, in the <S%H216>light<s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%>.
In thy <S%H8034>name<s%> shall they <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>: and in thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shall they be <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
For thou art the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of their <S%H5797>strength<s%>: and in thy <S%H7522>favour<s%> our <S%H7161>horn<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> <S%H7311><s%>.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is our <S%H4043>defence<s%>; and the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is our <S%H4428>king<s%>. the LORD: or, our shield is of the LORD, and our king is of the Holy One of Israel

Then thou <S%H1696>spakest<s%> in <S%H2377>vision<s%> to thy holy <S%H2623>one<s%>, and <S%H559>saidst<s%>, I have <S%H7737>laid<s%> <S%H5828>help<s%> upon one that is <S%H1368>mighty<s%>; I have <S%H7311>exalted<s%> one <S%H977>chosen<s%> out of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>; with my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> have I <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him:
With whom my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%>: mine <S%H2220>arm<s%> also shall <S%H553>strengthen<s%> him.
The <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall not <S%H5378>exact<s%> upon him; nor the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H6031>afflict<s%> him.
And I will beat <S%H3807>down<s%> his <S%H6862>foes<s%> before his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H5062>plague<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him.
But my <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and my <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall be with him: and in my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall his <S%H7161>horn<s%> be <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
I will <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> also in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> in the <S%H5104>rivers<s%>.
He shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto me, Thou art my <S%H1>father<s%>, my <S%H410>God<s%>, and the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
Also I will <S%H5414>make<s%> him my <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, <S%H5945>higher<s%> than the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
My <S%H2617>mercy<s%> will I <S%H8104>keep<s%> for him for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>, and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> shall stand <S%H539>fast<s%> with him.
His <S%H2233>seed<s%> also will I <S%H7760>make<s%> to endure for <S%H5703>ever<s%>, and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
If his <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> my <S%H8451>law<s%>, and <S%H3212>walk<s%> not in my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>;
If they <S%H2490>break<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> not my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>; break: Heb. profane
Then will I <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H6588>transgression<s%> with the <S%H7626>rod<s%>, and their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> with <S%H5061>stripes<s%>.

Nevertheless my <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will I not utterly <S%H6331>take<s%> from him, nor suffer my <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> to <S%H8266>fail<s%>. will: Heb. I will not make void from him to fall: Heb. to lie
My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> will I not <S%H2490>break<s%>, nor <S%H8138>alter<s%> the thing that is gone <S%H4161>out<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
<S%H259>Once<s%> have I <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by my <S%H6944>holiness<s%> that I will not <S%H3576>lie<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>. that: Heb. if I lie
His <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall endure for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> before me.
It shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> as the <S%H3394>moon<s%>, and as a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> in <S%H7834>heaven<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
But thou hast cast <S%H2186>off<s%> and <S%H3988>abhorred<s%>, thou hast been <S%H5674>wroth<s%> with thine <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.
Thou hast made <S%H5010>void<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>: thou hast <S%H2490>profaned<s%> his <S%H5145>crown<s%> by casting it to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
Thou hast broken <S%H6555>down<s%> all his <S%H1448>hedges<s%>; thou hast <S%H7760>brought<s%> his strong <S%H4013>holds<s%> to <S%H4288>ruin<s%>.
All that pass <S%H5674>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8155>spoil<s%> him: he is a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to his <S%H7934>neighbours<s%>.
Thou hast set <S%H7311>up<s%> the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>; thou hast made all his <S%H341>enemies<s%> to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>.
Thou hast also <S%H7725>turned<s%> the <S%H6697>edge<s%> of his <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and hast not made him to <S%H6965>stand<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
Thou hast made his <S%H2892>glory<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>, and <S%H4048>cast<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4048>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>. glory: Heb. brightness
The <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth<s%> hast thou <S%H7114>shortened<s%>: thou hast <S%H5844>covered<s%> him with <S%H955>shame<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
How long, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? wilt thou <S%H5641>hide<s%> thyself for <S%H5331>ever<s%>? shall thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%>?
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> how <S%H2465>short<s%> my time is: wherefore hast thou <S%H1254>made<s%> all <S%H1121>men<s%> <S%H120><s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%>?

What <S%H1397>man<s%> is he that <S%H2421>liveth<s%>, and shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%>? shall he <S%H4422>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7585>grave<s%>? <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
<S%H136>Lord<s%>, where are thy <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%>, which thou <S%H7650>swarest<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> in thy <S%H530>truth<s%>?

<S%H2142>Remember<s%>, <S%H136>Lord<s%>, the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>; how I do <S%H5375>bear<s%> in my <S%H2436>bosom<s%> the reproach of all the <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>;
Wherewith thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H2778>reproached<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; wherewith they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> the <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> of thine <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>. <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
